name: Arthur Yuzbashev
description: Organic Reddit Marketing without getting suspended

currentProject.name: MediaFast
currentProject.description:
MediaFa.st helps founders grow their startups organically on Reddit.
We create 30-day custom growth roadmaps — showing exactly what to post, where to comment, and how to build trust without getting banned.
✅ Platform-specific roadmaps (Reddit, X, LinkedIn, Bluesky)
✅ Daily post & comment plan for a full month
✅ Subreddit suggestions tailored to your niche
✅ Real-time analytics & performance tracking
Built for makers, SaaS founders, and agencies who want real attention — not ads.
Grow smarter, one authentic post at a time.
